CustomField.description: Enable if your property wants to merge any of these Room Block fields in Guestroom tables: Housing Method, Billing Instructions, Incidentals Billing, Meal Plan Rate, Meal Plan Type, or Confidential Rate.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enable if your property wants to merge any of these Room Block fields in Guestroom tables: Housing Method, Billing Instructions, Incidentals Billing, Meal Plan Rate, Meal Plan Type, or Confidential Rate.
CustomField.label: Enhance Booking Merge
